Package Networking

Class ServerService

java.lang.Object
Networking.ServerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Handles client connections and information transferred from clients

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor Description

    Player wins
    void removeClient​(ClientHandler client)
    Removes client
    void run()
    Listen for clients till the amount of players is reached then starts the game During game, wait for every player to send their updated cells and then send those updated cells to all other players At end of game doesn't auto shut down server (unless autoDisconnect is set to true) to allow players to chat
    void sendAll​(java.lang.Object obj)
    Send to all clients
    void sendUpdatedCells()
    Sends all updated cells received from players to every other player

    • ServerService

      public ServerService​(int rows, int cols, int foodAmount, int amountPlayers, int goal, int port, boolean autoDisconnect) throws java.io.IOException
      ServerService Constructor
      Parameters:
      rows - the rows for the grid
      cols - the cols for the grid
      foodAmount - the amount of food to be generated
      port - the port the server is hosted on
      amountPlayers - the maximum amount of players allowed
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Error while creating server

    • sendUpdatedCells

      public void sendUpdatedCells()
      Sends all updated cells received from players to every other player

    • hasStarted

      public boolean hasStarted()

    • run

      public void run()
      Listen for clients till the amount of players is reached then starts the game During game, wait for every player to send their updated cells and then send those updated cells to all other players At end of game doesn't auto shut down server (unless autoDisconnect is set to true) to allow players to chat
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • disconnectAll

      public void disconnectAll()
      Disconnects all clients connected

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.IOException
      Main
      Parameters:
      args - no command line args are used
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Error in forming server
